content: धीर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धियं राति रा-क, धियमीरयति ईर-अण् वा उप° स° <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} Brave, bold, courageous; धीरोद्धता गतिः <ls>U. 6. 19.</ls> {@--2@} Steady, steadfast, firm, durable, lasting, constant; <ls>R. 2. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Strong-minded, persevering, self-possessed, resolute, of firm resolve or purpose; धीरा हि तरंस्यापदं <ls>K. 175</ls>; विकारहेतौ सति विक्रियंते येषां न चेतांसि त एव धीराः <ls>Ku. 1. 59.</ls> {@--4@} Composed, calm, collected. {@--5@} Sedate, sober, grave, solemn; <ls>R. 18. 4.</ls> {@--6@} Strong, energetic. {@--7@} Wise, prudent, intelligent, sensible, learned, clever; धृतेश्च धीरः सदृशीर्व्यधत्त सः <ls>R. 3. 10</ls>; <ls n="R.">5. 38</ls>, <ls n="R.">16. 74</ls>; <ls>U. 5. 31.</ls> {@--8@} Deep, grave, loud, hollow (as sound); स्वरेण धीरेण निवर्तयन्निव <ls>R. 3. 43</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">59</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 17.</ls> {@--9@} Well-conducted, well-behaved. {@--10@} Gentle, soft, agreeable, pleasing (as a breeze); धीरसमीरे यमुनातीरे वसति वने वनमाली <ls>Gīt. 5.</ls> {@--11@} Lazy, dull. {@--12@} Daring. {@--13@} Headstrong. --रः {@--1@} The ocean. {@--2@} An epithet of Buddha. {@--3@} The thinking principle, the soul (चिदात्मन्). {@--4@} An epithet of king Bali. --रं Saffron. --रं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} Boldly, firmly, steadfastly, steadily; <ls>Bh. 2. 31</ls>; <ls>Amaru. 11.</ls>
